column4: I recently installed Kubuntu 7.04 on two laptops. I have an Apple AirPort 802.11n wifi router configured on WEP (older wifi cards around that I have) and when I try to authenticate it it only prompts for WPA authentication not WEP. Any suggestions?
I think the forum is your best bet for an answer   www.ubuntuforums.com
seems a tad on the slow side, it hasnT' loaded yet
Did that, changed the setup a lot, doesn't work
ok so noting fancy, let me get you the lines from my xorg. so you can paste them
It was my fault, usb cable was loose.
stick around I 'm trying to convince the network admins to x-line you permenently, and they need your ip adress,   for wasting the channel's time
try asking in #kubuntu  they know about kde there
